headline: AWS just changed my default currency?
description:
AWS suddenly changed all of my aws accounts (I manage several) from USD to CAD. This change was made without any warning.

I receved my usual monthly email: "Amazon Web Services Billing Statement Available / Relevé de facture Amazon Web Services disponible", which indicated that the payment would be processed in CAD, with an asteriks indicating: "* You have asked for this invoice to be processed in CAD. For more information visit https://aws.amazon.com/billing/faqs/#payment_currency"

When I log into my AWS account to change my default current back to USD, I am not able to. My only payment option in the dropdown list is CAD.
headline_zh-Hans: AWS刚刚改变了我的默认货币？
headline_zh-Hant: AWS剛剛改變了我的默認貨幣？
description_zh-Hans:
AWS突然将我所有的AWS账户（我管理着几个账户）从美元改为加元。

我收到了我通常的每月电子邮件："Amazon Web Services Billing Statement Available / Relevé de facture Amazon Web Services disponible"，这表明付款将以加元处理，并有一个asteriks表明："* 您要求以加元处理此发票。欲了解更多信息，请访问https://aws.amazon.com/billing/faqs/#payment_currency"

当我登录我的AWS帐户，将我的默认电流改回美元时，我无法做到。我在下拉列表中的唯一付款选项是加元。
description_zh-Hant:
AWS突然將我所有的AWS賬戶（我管理著幾個賬戶）從美元改為加元。

我收到了我通常的每月電子郵件："Amazon Web Services Billing Statement Available / Relevé de facture Amazon Web Services disponible"，這表明付款將以加元處理，並有一個asteriks表明："* 您要求以加元處理此發票。欲瞭解更多信息，請訪問https://aws.amazon.com/billing/faqs/#payment_currency"

當我登錄我的AWS帳戶，將我的默認電流改回美元時，我無法做到。我在下拉列表中的唯一付款選項是加元。
